vote.text: Amendment SA 2694 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2694 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Thune. (consideration: CR S6948-6949; text: CR S6949) To make a conforming amendment.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2694 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Thune.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2694 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
